data.name: LEAVES - The Journey - Supporter Pack
data.detailed_description:
LEAVES - The Journey - Supporter Pack


The supporter pack contains a selection of goodies for LEAVES - The Journey, for all those who want to go the extra mile to support the developer of the game.

Contents

  • The LEAVES Strategy Guide in a completely illustrated form
  • The LEAVES Strategy Guide - walkthrough version (in English and German)
  • Collection of LEAVES wallpapers
  • The LEAVES soundtrack

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your support!
